body:
I thought I would do an AMA so people could get to know me better and with the update I think now's the perfect time. 

Ask away Avicus! :)
body_tagged:

title: Update AMA

replies.body: What is your favourite addition that the Omega Update brought?
replies.body_tagged: What is your favourite addition that the Omega Update brought?

replies.body: Survival Games :D it's by far my favourite mini game out there
replies.body_tagged: Survival Games :D it's by far my favourite mini game out there
